channel.title: Adding Prayers?
channel.description:
I'm looking to add two prayers mostly on my 317 server. I would like to add Soul Split and Turmoil, to the same interface as the regular prayers. I would also like them to have the right emotes (e.g. turmoil he throws his hands up, soulsplit with the white things).
Can someone tell me how to do so? I have no idea even where to start.
